episodes.title: Religion and LTD | Interview with The Smith's Part 2
episodes.description:
Hi, my name is Chrystal and welcome to the channel! Today I get to speak with former members of LTD Luke and Laura Smith in this part 2 interview. The Smith's and I talk about their experience while in Amway/LTD and the religious aspects of it. They are based in Columbus Ohio and have great advice to share. If you have any questions you can leave a comment and I’d be happy to answer them. Thanks for watching and have a great day!

Previous video here: https://youtu.be/8nJIF_H2Sdo?si=7gAKCBVSX5416lUH

Email me here: speaceandrelaxation@gmail.com

episodes.description:

His name is Judah Ayers and we talk about his experience while in Amway/LTD for 22 years and how he got kicked out for telling the truth and asking the wrong questions! episodes.title: Fake Diamonds, Uplines That Bully You and The Upcoming Lawsuit | TJ Musumhi Interview
episodes.description:
Hi, my name is Chrystal and today I get to speak with another former member of LTD. His name is TJ and we talk about his experience while in Amway/LTD, the struggles he faced and the class action lawsuit he is filing against LTD as an organization. He was in the business for 6 years and wow is his story interesting! Hope you enjoy the interview and as usual, if you have any questions you can leave a comment and I’d be happy to answer them. Thanks for watching and have a great day!

Here is TJ's information:

Contact email: tomwesten1@gmail.com

Website:
www.unplugltdtools.com 

Podcast links:
https://open.spotify.com/show/2EclIHVfanGf9yfP4HnWIT
http://www.youtube.com/@Unplug9651
https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/unplug/id1722867966
https://www.iheart.com/podcast/269-unplug-137867673/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/unplug.podcast?igsh=MXAxeWozcWJsamtsaA==

Three questions to ask when getting sponsored:
1. May I see your profit and loss balance sheet for you business?
2. How many of your downlines are generating a profit?
3. How many of your Amway leaders are actually qualified leaders?

Email me here: speaceandrelaxation@gmail.com
